messages.subject: To unsubscribe you need to...
messages.msgSnippet: Either send an email to this address; Unsubscribe: Unschooling-dotcom-unsubscribe@onelist.com Or go to this page and sign in and click on the unsubscribe
messages.messageBody:
Either send an email to this address;
Unsubscribe: Unschooling-dotcom-unsubscribe@onelist.com

Or go to this page and sign in and click on the unsubscribe button;
URL to this page: http://www.onelist.com/group/Unschooling-dotcom

If neither one of those options work for you then you can send
email to the list owner and ask for help;
List owner: Unschooling-dotcom-owner@onelist.com

Good Luck!
Kevin M. Avery
unschooling Dad :o)
